constituent: metropolis, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day, city walls
koohiiStory1: In a metropolis people are just puppets inside city walls, there is no individuality if you live so close together.
koohiiStory2: A vision of a futuristic METROPOLIS: standing at the window of your 400th floor apartment, hand in hand with your LOVE DOLL, gazing out at the gigantic CITY WALLS that you can never escape.
readingExamples: 都会 (とかい), 都心 (としん), 首都 (しゅと), 都 (みやこ)
words:
首都(しゅと): capital city
都(と): metropolitan, municipal
都会(とかい): city
都市(とし): town, city, municipal, urban
都心(としん): heart of city
都(みやこ): capital
都合(つごう): circumstances, convenience
